plugins.name: Iconoir Icons - Iconify Library
plugins.description:
🎨 Iconoir Icons – Iconify Library brings the full Iconoir icon set — one of the largest open-source icon collections — right into your Figma workflow. Whether you're working on dashboards, mobile apps, or sleek landing pages, Iconoir’s minimal and modern design fits perfectly into any project. 🖼️📱


This plugin, powered by Iconify, lets you search, preview, and insert icons effortlessly, without ever leaving Figma. No downloading, no importing SVGs manually — just clean, scalable icons ready to drop into your canvas. ✨


💡 Key Features:


🧩 Full access to the Iconoir icon set (1,500+ icons)


🔍 Fast, intuitive search with real-time previews


⚡ One-click insert into your Figma design


🖌️ Customizable stroke width and color


🆓 100% free and open-source via Iconify


🔄 Always up to date with the latest icons

plugins.name: UXDocx - Styles and Variables Table Component Generator
plugins.description:
Generate ready to use table components containing your local variables and styles including their type, collection and values. The component is generated with pre-made variants for types (effects, paints, text, numbers, strings etc.).


Easy to use:

Open the file containing the desired variables and styles

Click on of the 2 Generate buttons. One for variables and the other for styles.

That's it


Bonus: These components can be used in Figma Sites too in cases you want your documentation there


Coming soon:

Modes

plugins.name: Heurator
plugins.description:
Elevate your design critique process with Heurator, a powerful Figma plugin that brings Nielsen's 10 Usability Heuristics directly into your workflow.


Document, visualize, and solve usability issues with precision—all without leaving your design files.


✓ Pinpoint violations with customizable severity ratings

✓ Generate visually striking evaluation cards linked to problem areas

✓ Create actionable recommendations to improve user experience

✓ Maintain consistent evaluation criteria across your team


Even in the age of AI-generated interfaces, human-centered heuristic evaluation remains essential. While AI excels at creating visually appealing designs, it often misses nuanced usability concerns that experienced designers catch. Heurator bridges this gap by helping you apply proven principles to any interface—whether human or AI-designed—ensuring truly intuitive experiences.


Transform complex usability principles into practical insights and deliver more thoughtful, user-centered designs with Heurator.
plugins.tagline: Because Even AI-Generated UIs Need Human-Centered Evaluation

131446.name: Heurator

✓ Maintain consistent evaluation criteria across your team


Even in the age of AI-generated interfaces, human-centered heuristic evaluation remains essential. While AI excels at creating visually appealing designs, it often misses nuanced usability concerns that experienced designers catch. Heurator bridges this gap by helping you apply proven principles to any interface—whether human or AI-designed—ensuring truly intuitive experiences.


Transform complex usability principles into practical insights and deliver more thoughtful, user-centered designs with Heurator.
131446.tagline: Because Even AI-Generated UIs Need Human-Centered Evaluation

plugins.name: Forma
plugins.description:
🎨 FORMA: Design Systems in Minutes, Not Months! 🚀


Ever tried creating a design system from scratch? It's like trying to fold a fitted sheet – seemingly impossible and will probably make you cry. 😭


Forma swoops in to save your sanity with magical design system generation powers:


✨ COLOR SORCERY

• Create gorgeous Pantone-style color palettes

• Generate perfect shades that actually make sense

• Turn chaotic color choices into harmonious design languages


📝 TYPOGRAPHY WIZARDRY

• Conjure complete typography hierarchies faster than you can say "Comic Sans is unacceptable"

• 9 perfectly balanced text styles that your design lead will actually approve

• Font fallbacks that won't make your developers rage-quit


🧩 DESIGN TOKENS

• Spacing systems that maintain mathematical harmony

• Size tokens that scale beautifully across devices

• Consistent radius values (because inconsistent corner radii are criminal)


⚠️ BETA ALERT ⚠️

This release is a preview of Forma's powers - not for production just yet! We're still brewing up more magical features like component generation, brand voice integration, and design consistency checks.


Created with ❤️ (and a lot of coffee) by a designer who got tired of rebuilding the same foundations over and over again.
plugins.tagline: Design System Generator

129323.description:

plugins.name: Prism by lumos
plugins.description:
🌈 Prism by Lumos


A smarter way to manage your Figma color variables


Prism is a powerful, easy-to-use plugin built to help you create, organize, and maintain a clean, scalable color system in Figma. Whether you’re building from scratch or refining an existing system, Prism takes the heavy lifting out of color management.


It’s the same powerful tool we use to power the Lumos Design System — with token-based color management built right in.


⸻


✨ What Prism does best

•🎨 Full Color System

Instantly generate a complete color palette (from 50 to 900) based on your base colors.

•🔗 Semantic Color Mapping

Create semantic color variables that stay linked to your base palette.

•🌗 Light & Dark Theme Support

Effortlessly manage color values for both light and dark modes.

•🧰 Visual Color Editor

Tweak colors visually with a real-time preview — no guesswork required.

•📁 Clean, Organized Structure

Keeps your color variables tidy and consistent with logical naming and folders.

•🧩 Built for Design Tokens

Prism follows a token-based approach inspired by the Lumos Design System, making it easy to plug into any design system workflow.


⸻


Prism helps you focus on what matters — great design — by handling the complexity of color systems behind the scenes. Perfect for design systems, large projects, or anyone who wants a more organized Figma file.
plugins.tagline: Color token management designed to power the Lumos Design System.

128317.description:

128317.tagline: Color token management designed to power the Lumos Design System.

plugins.name: PureImage Export
plugins.description:
PureImage Export saves you the hassle of removing Corner radius and Effects when exporting images in Figma. With this plugin, you can easily export optimized images without the need for manual adjustments.


PureImage Export Features

🧹 Remove Corner Radius & Effects

🔍 Preview Display

📁 Bulk Download Multiple Layers


How to Use:

  1. Select the layer with a Corner radius or Effects applied.
  2. Set up the export (default settings work fine too).
  3. Execute the PureImage Export.
  4. Set the Corner radius/Effects and click [Export as [file format]].


Recommended For:

  1. Anyone who needs to export optimized images from Figma for web development.
  2. Web designers and frontend developers who want to easily export and import images from Figma.
plugins.tagline: Export optimized images from Figma without removing corner radius or effects!

125876.name: PureImage Export
125876.description:

  2. Set up the export (default settings work fine too).
  3. Execute the PureImage Export.
  4. Set the Corner radius/Effects and click [Export as [file format]].


Recommended For:

  1. Anyone who needs to export optimized images from Figma for web development.
  2. Web designers and frontend developers who want to easily export and import images from Figma.
125876.tagline: Export optimized images from Figma without removing corner radius or effects!

plugins.name: Sizr
plugins.description: Sizr is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the process of resizing elements within a frame. By leveraging the column grid layout of the parent frame, the plugin ensures precise alignment and proportional scaling of selected elements. Whether you’re working with rectangles, text layers, groups, or components, Column Sizr dynamically calculates the appropriate dimensions based on the grid’s column count, margins, and gutter size. Simply select your elements, define the desired number of columns, and let the plugin handle the rest. Ideal for designers aiming for consistency and accuracy in grid-based designs.
plugins.tagline: Resize elements dynamically based on the column grid of their parent frame.

111068.name: Sizr
111068.description: Sizr is a Figma plugin designed to streamline the process of resizing elements within a frame. By leveraging the column grid layout of the parent frame, the plugin ensures precise alignment and proportional scaling of selected elements. Whether you’re working with rectangles, text layers, groups, or components, Column Sizr dynamically calculates the appropriate dimensions based on the grid’s column count, margins, and gutter size. Simply select your elements, define the desired number of columns, and let the plugin handle the rest. Ideal for designers aiming for consistency and accuracy in grid-based designs.
111068.release_notes:
Support for Components
Added:
- The plugin now supports resizing elements based on the grid of a parent `COMPONENT` in addition to a `FRAME`.
- Automatically detects whether the parent is a `FRAME` or `COMPONENT` with a valid grid layout.
- Displays appropriate notifications if resizing is restricted (e.g., when dealing with a master component).

Fixed:
- Improved error handling and user feedback for unsupported parent types or missing grid layouts.

How to Use:
1. Select an element within a `FRAME` or `COMPONENT` with a grid.
2. Trigger the plugin to resize compatible elements based on the grid layout.
111068.tagline: Resize elements dynamically based on the column grid of their parent frame.

plugins.name: Lint copy
plugins.description:
Lint copy helps UX writers and content designers automatically enforce style rules with a custom word list.


Enforce things like plain language (e.g. detect "utilize" and suggest replacing it with "use"), the company's voice and tone (e.g. detect "we are" and suggest using the contraction), and even product terminology.


Create a custom word list in JSON and host it in a public GitHub repository to experience the plugin's full power.


The plugin also enforces sentence case and strings starting with a capital, neither of which is customizable.


For full details, read the documentation.
plugins.tagline: Check text layers against a word list to enforce style, voice, and terminology.

Create a custom word list in JSON and host it in a public GitHub repository to experience the plugin's full power.


The plugin also enforces sentence case and strings starting with a capital, neither of which is customizable.


For full details, read the documentation.
103128.tagline: Check text layers against a word list to enforce style, voice, and terminology.

plugins.name: Text Harvest
plugins.description:
Text Harvest exports and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

Get a quick CSV file from your designs for your copywriting or localization team.


Export

  1. Make a selection or export the entire page if there's no selection
  2. The plugin export only the visible layers, and also ignore the duplicated ones
  3. You'll get a CSV file with layer names and its content
  4. You can skip text layers that you don't want to export by simply adding the symbol "!" at the beginning of the layer name


Update

  1. Make a selection or update the entire page if there's no selection
  2. Select the CSV file
  3. The plugin updates all the layers with the same name


Currently multicolumn CSV are not supported. If you need to translate to different languages, upload an independent CSV for each one
plugins.tagline: Export and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

100611.name: Text Harvest
100611.description:
Text Harvest exports and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

Get a quick CSV file from your designs for your copywriting or localization team.


Export

  1. Make a selection or export the entire page if there's no selection
  2. The plugin export only the visible layers, and also ignore the duplicated ones
  3. You'll get a CSV file with layer names and its content
  4. You can skip text layers that you don't want to export by simply adding the symbol "!" at the beginning of the layer name


Update

  1. Make a selection or update the entire page if there's no selection
  2. Select the CSV file
  3. The plugin updates all the layers with the same name


Currently multicolumn CSV are not supported. If you need to translate to different languages, upload an independent CSV for each one
100611.release_notes: Fixed a major bug that caused the update functionality not to work.
100611.tagline: Export and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

plugins.name: SVG Exporter
plugins.description:
Este plugin te permite exportar elementos gráficos (assets) en formato SVG desde cualquier Frame que selecciones en Figma. Al ejecutarlo:

1. El plugin detecta automáticamente los vectores, íconos y componentes dentro del frame seleccionado.

2. Muestra una lista con vista previa de cada asset, su nombre y tipo (VECTOR, LINE, COMPONENT, etc.).

3. Puedes filtrar por tipo, seleccionar o deseleccionar assets individualmente o todos a la vez.

4. Al hacer clic en “Exportar selección”, los archivos se descargan en un ZIP listo para usar.


Uso paso a paso:

• Selecciona un Frame que contenga los assets que deseas exportar.

• Ejecuta el plugin.

• Filtra, selecciona y exporta.


Limitaciones actuales:

• Solo funciona si seleccionas un Frame (no soporta múltiples frames a la vez).

• Solo exporta elementos compatibles con formato SVG.

• No incluye imágenes rasterizadas, texto plano ni auto layout como exportables.

• No detecta automáticamente cambios de selección; requiere usar el botón “Actualizar selección”.



-----------------------------------------


This plugin lets you export graphical elements (assets) as SVG files from any selected Frame in Figma.


When you run the plugin:

1. It scans the selected frame for valid exportable elements (e.g., VECTORS, ICONS, COMPONENTS).

2. You’ll see a list of assets with preview thumbnails, names, and their Figma types.

3. You can filter by type, toggle selection, and bulk-select assets.

4. Clicking “Export Selection” downloads all selected assets as a clean ZIP file of SVGs.


How to use it:

• Select a Frame that contains the assets you want to export.

• Launch the plugin.

• Use the filters, select assets, and export.


Current limitations:

• Only one Frame can be selected at a time.

• Only elements that support SVG export will be included (e.g., no bitmaps or text layers).

• Does not automatically react to new selections — use the “Refresh Selection” button manually when needed.
plugins.tagline: Exporta fácilmente assets SVG desde frames seleccionados en Figma, con vista previa y filtros.

plugins.name: Text Auto Fill
plugins.description:
Figma Plugin User Guide for Beginners


What It Does

This Figma plugin lets you update text and hide layers in selected frames or instances. It’s easy to use with a text-based configuration for both specific and global changes.


How to Use It

  1. Select a Frame or Instance: In Figma, click a frame or instance to edit.
  2. Open the Plugin: Run the plugin from Figma’s menu (Plugins > Your Plugin Name).
  3. Enter Configuration: In the plugin window, type instructions to change text or hide layers (see examples below).
  4. Click Run: The plugin applies your changes instantly.


Configuration Examples

• Change Specific Text: To update text in a layer named title inside a frame named block, type:

block.title: Hello World

This sets the title layer’s text to "Hello World".


• Change Text Globally: To update all layers named text in any frame, type:

text: Welcome

This changes every text layer’s text to "Welcome".


• Hide a Specific Layer: To hide a layer named subtitle in the block frame, type:

//block.subtitle

This hides the subtitle layer.


• Hide a Layer Globally: To hide all layers named icon, type:

//icon

This hides every icon layer.


• Rename a Frame: To rename a frame named block, type:

$Title block: New Frame Name

This renames the frame to "New Frame Name".


• Combine Actions: Mix specific and global changes, like:

block.title: Welcome
text: Hello
//block.subtitle
//icon

This updates block.title to "Welcome", all text layers to "Hello", hides block.subtitle, and hides all icon layers.


Tips

  1. Write one instruction per line.
  2. Layer names must match exactly (case-sensitive).
  3. Select at least one frame or instance, or you’ll get an error.
plugins.tagline: Automatically update text in frames with key-value data

135574.name: Text Auto Fill
135574.description:
Figma Plugin User Guide for Beginners


What It Does

This Figma plugin lets you update text and hide layers in selected frames or instances. It’s easy to use with a text-based configuration for both specific and global changes.


How to Use It

  1. Select a Frame or Instance: In Figma, click a frame or instance to edit.
  2. Open the Plugin: Run the plugin from Figma’s menu (Plugins > Your Plugin Name).
  3. Enter Configuration: In the plugin window, type instructions to change text or hide layers (see examples below).
  4. Click Run: The plugin applies your changes instantly.


Configuration Examples

• Change Specific Text: To update text in a layer named title inside a frame named block, type:

block.title: Hello World

This sets the title layer’s text to "Hello World".


• Change Text Globally: To update all layers named text in any frame, type:

text: Welcome

This changes every text layer’s text to "Welcome".


• Hide a Specific Layer: To hide a layer named subtitle in the block frame, type:

//block.subtitle

This hides the subtitle layer.


• Hide a Layer Globally: To hide all layers named icon, type:

//icon

This hides every icon layer.


• Rename a Frame: To rename a frame named block, type:

$Title block: New Frame Name

This renames the frame to "New Frame Name".


• Combine Actions: Mix specific and global changes, like:

block.title: Welcome
text: Hello
//block.subtitle
//icon

This updates block.title to "Welcome", all text layers to "Hello", hides block.subtitle, and hides all icon layers.


Tips

  1. Write one instruction per line.
  2. Layer names must match exactly (case-sensitive).
  3. Select at least one frame or instance, or you’ll get an error.
135574.tagline: Automatically update text in frames with key-value data

plugins.name: TokenTidy
plugins.description: TokenTidy helps you quickly find frames, layers, and text in your Figma files that are missing design tokens. Scan selected frames and get a clean, organized report of elements missing fills, strokes, or typography styles. Perfect for teams standardizing their design systems or tidying up messy files. Save time, stay consistent, and ship polished designs with ease.
plugins.tagline: Spot unstyled elements instantly.

131180.name: TokenTidy
131180.description: TokenTidy helps you quickly find frames, layers, and text in your Figma files that are missing design tokens. Scan selected frames and get a clean, organized report of elements missing fills, strokes, or typography styles. Perfect for teams standardizing their design systems or tidying up messy files. Save time, stay consistent, and ship polished designs with ease.
131180.release_notes:
TokenTidy v1.0.2 – UI & Accessibility Polish

What’s new:
Success message now features a clear checkmark-in-circle icon in accessible green for better clarity and contrast.
All icons are larger and spacing is more visually balanced for a friendlier, more readable experience.
Improved padding and spacing in all feedback messages.
Warning and success messages are visually distinct and easy to understand.
All icons and colors pass accessibility contrast checks.
General UI polish and minor bug fixes.

Thank you for using TokenTidy! If you have feedback or suggestions, let us know.

plugins.name: Numeric Variable Checker
plugins.description:
Numeric Variable Checker は、Figma上で数値のハードコーディング（Variablesが適用されていない数値）を検出し、一覧で確認できるプラグインです。


対象は、padding・spacing・width・height・cornerRadius・strokeWeight などの数値プロパティ。


Variablesが未適用の数値だけを抽出し、親子階層を含めて再帰的にチェック。

該当のフレームにはワンクリックでジャンプできます。


-


Numeric Variable Checker is a Figma plugin that helps you detect and list raw numeric values in your design—such as padding, spacing, width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight—that are not yet connected to Variables.


Whether you're building a design system or refining your layout for scalability, this plugin ensures your numbers are consistent, maintainable, and tokenized.


It recursively scans all selected frames and their children, highlights unbound values, and lets you jump to each frame with one click.
plugins.tagline: For designs that stay consistent down to the pixel.

126488.name: Numeric Variable Checker
126488.description:
Numeric Variable Checker は、Figma上で数値のハードコーディング（Variablesが適用されていない数値）を検出し、一覧で確認できるプラグインです。


対象は、padding・spacing・width・height・cornerRadius・strokeWeight などの数値プロパティ。


Variablesが未適用の数値だけを抽出し、親子階層を含めて再帰的にチェック。

該当のフレームにはワンクリックでジャンプできます。


-


Numeric Variable Checker is a Figma plugin that helps you detect and list raw numeric values in your design—such as padding, spacing, width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight—that are not yet connected to Variables.


Whether you're building a design system or refining your layout for scalability, this plugin ensures your numbers are consistent, maintainable, and tokenized.


It recursively scans all selected frames and their children, highlights unbound values, and lets you jump to each frame with one click.
126488.tagline: For designs that stay consistent down to the pixel.

plugins.name: QR Code Generator
plugins.description:
Generate QR codes without leaving Figma. Customize with your own link, logo and colors.


This plugin creates static QR codes in SVG format, so they can be resized without losing quality. It uses RecodeQR to generate the image (no account needed). The QR codes are fully self-contained: they don’t rely on our service and they’re yours forever.


Tip: To scan QR codes you can use the camera app on iOS, or you can also inspect them online.
plugins.tagline: Create QR codes without leaving Figma

126163.name: QR Code Generator
126163.description:
Generate QR codes without leaving Figma. Customize with your own link, logo and colors.


This plugin creates static QR codes in SVG format, so they can be resized without losing quality. It uses RecodeQR to generate the image (no account needed). The QR codes are fully self-contained: they don’t rely on our service and they’re yours forever.


Tip: To scan QR codes you can use the camera app on iOS, or you can also inspect them online.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin requires network access to RecodeQR's API to generate QR codes. No user data is stored.

126163.release_notes: Fixed dark mode, improve community details
126163.tagline: Create QR codes without leaving Figma

plugins.name: Pattern Blocks
plugins.description:
Unlock unlimited pattern creation with Patternblocks!


With access to hundreds of unique shapes, you can create an endless variety of patterns tailored to your needs. Easily control tiling and pattern variety to achieve the perfect design, whether you're creating backgrounds, UI elements, or other graphic assets.


Customize colors and shape selections to match your vision, and export your patterns in high-quality PNG or SVG vector formats for use in web, app, and product designs.
plugins.tagline: Create endless unique vector patterns with hundreds of shapes for web, app, and product UI designs.

plugins.name: 1 Click Utility
plugins.description:
Speed Up Your Figma Workflow


🎨 Style Management

  1. Instantly convert selected elements into color styles
  2. Transform text layers into consistent text styles


📝 Text Utilities

  1. Quick Lorem Ipsum insertion (word, sentence, or auto-fill)
  2. Smart text splitting with auto layout
  3. Intelligent line-by-line text organization


📐 Layout Tools

  1. One-click auto layout application for any selected element
  2. One click to set all image to fill mode


♿️ Accessibility Checker

- Real-time WCAG contrast compliance checking

- Automatic suggestions for improving text visibility


🤝 Three View Modes

Switch between Expanded, Compact, and Grid views to match your working style:

- Expanded: Full descriptions and organized sections

- Compact: Space-efficient with all functions readily available

- Grid: Quick access to frequently used tools
plugins.tagline: Utility plugin that provides single-click actions for repetitive tasks.

plugins.name: Magnetic Snap
plugins.description:
You can align multiple selected objects horizontally or vertically with no gaps (0px spacing).


When aligning horizontally, objects are placed from left to right, and when aligning vertically, objects are placed from top to bottom. Setting a keyboard shortcut allows you to align objects more quickly than setting 0 pixels of space in Auto Layout.


選択した複数オブジェクトを水平方向または垂直方向に、隙間なく(間隔0pxで)揃えることができます。


水平揃えの場合、オブジェクトは左から右に配置され、垂直揃えの場合、上から下に配置されます。キーボードショートカットを設定すると、Auto Layoutで0ピクセルのスペースを設定するよりも素早く揃えることができます。
plugins.tagline: Align objects with zero spacing

plugins.name: DesignBoost
plugins.description:
Plugin Description

This Figma plugin integrates with Qingmu Gallery, allowing users to access and utilize its extensive image database directly within Figma. Users can search and filter images based on tags and names. The plugin displays a list of matching images, and with a simple click, users can place and edit the images in their Figma projects.
plugins.tagline: DesignBoost

The plugin displays a list of matching images, and with a simple click, users can place and edit the images in their Figma projects.

plugins.name: Section Generator
plugins.description:
Allows you to create a large number of sections all at once. This is a great way to organize a handoff file with each row for different functionality or features.


Main section

Each main section is a row with a cover tile. The cover tile will be titled with the name you give. Main sections are stacked vertically.


Subsections

Configure the number of subsections you want per row. Subsections are spaced horizontally.


-> Allows you to include any number of desktop (1440) and mobile (390) screens

-> Each screen has a notes field below it for your annotations
plugins.tagline: Create sections of sections for an organized design handoff

108541.name: Section Generator
108541.description:

Main section

-> Allows you to include any number of desktop (1440) and mobile (390) screens

-> Each screen has a notes field below it for your annotations
